snippet: The auditor said The Wall Street Journal Europe had “circuitious” arrangements but that an investigation had turned up “no clear evidence” of violations.
abstract: British auditor for newspaper sales says an unusual distribution arrangement operated by The Wall Street Journal Europe appears to comply with its reporting standards; says an investigation turns up 'no clear evidence' of violations.
lead_paragraph: The auditor said The Wall Street Journal Europe had “circuitious” arrangements but that an investigation had turned up “no clear evidence” of violations.

headline.main: Auditor Clears The Journal Of Improprieties in Europe
headline.print_headline: Auditor Clears The Journal Of Improprieties in Europe
